comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: May 13, 1917: Pitching for Seattle, left-hander Paul Strand, who had begun his career with Spokane in 1911, pitched a perfect game to defeat the Indians 1-0. all is stats... www.baseball-reference.com/s/stranpa01.shtml

comment.author: 10857425@N05
comment._content: The Spokane Indians are still waiting to win one! LOL
